/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -ccbin=g++ -O2 -g -DNDEBUG --generate-code=arch=compute_70,code=[compute_70,sm_70] --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] --generate-code=arch=compute_80,code=[compute_80,sm_80] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/gccl_mpi_unit_tests.dir/init_unittest_mpi.cc.o CMakeFiles/gccl_mpi_unit_tests.dir/test_mpi_utils.cc.o CMakeFiles/gccl_mpi_unit_tests.dir/api_unittest_mpi_gpu.cc.o CMakeFiles/gccl_mpi_unit_tests.dir/unittest_main.cc.o -o CMakeFiles/gccl_mpi_unit_tests.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  ../libgccl_static.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgtest.a  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
